shapes3d

Class Terrain.TSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.Terrain.TSection
  • Enclosing class:
    Terrain

    public class Terrain.TSection
extends Object
    Simple class to represent a section of the terrain. Used internally to represent an area of the terrain to be drawn.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
